Title: Relates to authorizing the closure of the Dunn landfill in the city of Rensselaer
Summary: Authorizes the closure of the Dunn Mine and C&D Debris Disposal Facility in the city of Rensselaer by the department of environmental conservation by July 1, 2023.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the closure of the Dunn Mine and C&D Debris Disposal Facility; and providing for the repeal of such provision upon expiration thereof
